author: Staff Reporter
text:
Students of Pondicherry University on Monday observed a hunger strike in front of the main gate of the university campus.

They demanded implementation of 25 per cent reservation for students of Puducherry in admissions to the institution.

Administration fails to take interest in students

“There was a lot of hope after the new administration assumed charge. But nothing concrete has happened so far. The administration has failed to do anything in the interest and development of the student community,” a spokesperson of the Students Council said.

Security

The students have also demanded strengthening of security inside the campus, fee exemption for students belonging to Scheduled Caste and Scheduled Tribe communities, exit option for integrated students and proper implementation of SC/ST welfare schemes among others.
title: Pondicherry varsity students observe hunger strike
